question: Which of the following Vakataka ruler is believed to have defeated the Kadambas of Banavasi?
explanation: The Vakataka ruler Vindhyashakti II/ Vindhyasena ruled from c. 355 to 400 CE. Vidhyasena is believed to have defeated the Kadambas of Banavasi. The Kadambas of BanavasiÂ ruled over Kuntala (north Karnataka).
